text: Jesper Christensen (; born 16 May 1948) is a Danish actor. He was born in Copenhagen. He is known for his roles in The Interpreter and Revelations. He has also appeared as Mr. White in the James Bond movies Casino Royale, Quantum of Solace, and Spectre. ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors who played in James Bond movies Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Danish stage actors Category:Actors from Copenhagen
title: Jesper Christensen
